original_text: Then King Nebuchadnezzar fell upon his face and paid homage to Daniel, and commanded that an offering and incense be offered up to him.
korean_text: 이에 느부갓네살 왕이 엎드려 다니엘에게 절하고 명하여 예물과 향품을 그에게 주게 하니라

sentences.original_text: Then King Nebuchadnezzar fell upon his face
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 느부갓네살 왕은 얼굴을 땅에 대고 엎드렸습니다

sentences.original_text: that an offering and incense be offered up to him.
